Among the charging-on-the-go bundles, a notable inclusion is the brand’s Elite 200 v2 Portable Power Station with an Alternator & Solar Dual DC Charger 2 at $1,044.05 shipped, after using the exclusive code 9TO5TOYS5OFF at checkout, which has no matching bundle at Amazon, but you can find the standalone station there for $899. We saw this bundle included as part of the Charger 2 launch deals back in January carrying a $2,298 full price and dropping down to $1,049 with discounts, which has remained the lowest tracked price up until today. Now, you’ll be getting a combined 55% markdown for $1,254 savings that lands it down at a new all-time low price. You can also get the station on its own for $854.05 shipped, after using the same code above. Head below to see the full lineup of deals while this event lasts.

items.title: News Analysis: Tariffs bite, but erratic U.S. trade policies inflict greater damage
items.summary: LONDON, Feb. 25 (Xinhua) -- The United States began enforcing a new round of global tariffs Tuesday, imposing a 10 percent levy on most imports to replace broad duties recently struck down by the Supreme Court. The Trump administration has also indicated plans to raise the rate to 15 percent. Read full story

The hype cycle is over, or at least taking a break. So what comes next?  On […]

items.title: Finland logs second warmest year on record in 2025
items.summary: HELSINKI, Feb. 25 (Xinhua) -- Finland recorded its second warmest year on record in 2025, with temperatures across most of the country only slightly below the record set in 2020, the Finnish Meteorological Institute (FMI) said in its annual climate report released on Wednesday. What we love

If you drive a J1772-compatible EV or live within a household of mixed EVs with both J1772 and NACS needs, this handy little adapter fixes all your charging problems. You’ll be able to guarantee that any EV charger you come across at various homes or on the road can be utilized to top off your battery – and the best part is it fits level 1 and level 2 models alike.
